abilities.name: Star
abilities.bottomDescription: Activate (X) to enter Astral Form where you can place Stars with Primary Fire. Stars can be reactivated later, transforming them into a Nova Pulse, Nebula, or Gravity Well.

abilities.name: Nova Pulse
abilities.bottomDescription: Activate a Star to detonate a Nova Pulse. The Nova Pulse charges briefly then strikes, concussing all players in its area.

abilities.name: Gravity Well
abilities.bottomDescription: Activate a Star to form a Gravity Well. Players in the area are pulled toward the center before it explodes, making all players still trapped inside fragile.

abilities.name: Nebula
abilities.bottomDescription: Activate a Star to transform it into a Nebula (smoke). Use (F) on a Star to Dissipate it, returning the star to be placed in a new location after a delay. Dissipate briefly forms a fake Nebula at the Star’s location before returning.

abilities.name: Astral Form / Cosmic Divide
abilities.bottomDescription: Activate (X) to enter Astral Form where you can place Stars with Primary Fire. Stars can be reactivated later, transforming them into a Nova Pulse, Nebula, or Gravity Well. When Cosmic Divide is charged, use Secondary Fire in Astral Form to begin aiming it, then Primary Fire to select two locations. An infinite Cosmic Divide connects the two points you select. Cosmic Divide blocks bullets and heavily dampens audio.

abilities.name: Aftershock
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a fusion charge.
Fire the charge to set a slow-acting burst through the wall. The three bursts does 60 damage each to anyone caught in its area. dazing all players in its zone and in a line up in the zone.

abilities.name: Flashpoint
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a blinding charge.
Fire the charge to set a fast-acting burst through the wall. The charge detonates to blind all players looking at it.

abilities.name: Fault Line
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a seismic blast.
Release to set off the quake.

abilities.name: Rolling Thunder
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a Seismic Charge.
Fire to send a cascading quake through all the terrain in a large cone. The quake dazes and kocks up anyone caught in it.

abilities.name: Stim Beacon
abilities.bottomDescription: Equip to toss the stim beacon in front of Brimstone. Upon landing, the stim beacon will create a field that grants players RapidFire. The stim beacon grants also a rapid 15% speed boost.

abilities.name: Incendiary
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip an incendiary grenade launcher.
Fire to launch a grenade that detonates as it comes to rest on the floor, creating a lingering fire zone that damages players within the zone.

abilities.name: Sky Smoke
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a tactical map.
Fire' to set locatons where Brimstone where Brimstone'ssmoke clouds will land.
Alternate fire to confirm, launching long-lasting smoke clouds that block vision in the selected area.

abilities.name: Orbital Strike
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a tactical map.
Fire to launch a lingering orbital strike laser at the slected location, dealing high damage-over-time to players caught in the selected area.

abilities.name: Trademark
abilities.bottomDescription: PLACE a trap that scans for enemies. When a visible enemy comes in range, the trap counts down and then destabilizes the terrain around them, creating a lingering field that slows players caught inside of it.

abilities.name: Headhunter
abilities.bottomDescription: ACTIVATE to equip a heavy pistol. ALT FIRE with the pistol equipped to aim down sights.

abilities.name: Rendezvous
abilities.bottomDescription: PLACE two teleport anchors. While on the ground and in range of an anchor, REACTIVATE to quickly teleport to the other anchor. Anchors can be picked up to be REDEPLOYED.

abilities.name: Tour De Force
abilities.bottomDescription: ACTIVATE to summon a powerful, custom sniper rifle that will kill an enemy with any direct hit. Killing an enemy creates a lingering field that slows players caught inside of it.

abilities.name: Trapwire
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a trapwire.
Fire to place a destructible and cover tripwire at the targeted location, creating a line that spans between the placed location and the wall opposite. Enemy players who cross a tripwire will be tethered, revealed and dazed after a short period if they do not destroy the device in time. This ability can be picked up to be redeployed.

abilities.name: Cyber Cage
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a cyber cage.
Fire to toss the cyber cage in front of Cypher.
Activate to create a zone that blocks vision and creates a sound when enemy's enter it. ( Can be picked up during buy phase.)

abilities.name: Spycam
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a spycam.
Fire to place the spycam at the targeted location.
Re-use this ability to take control of the camera's view. While in control of the camera.
Fire to shoot a marking dart. This dart will reveal the location of any player struck by the dart.

abilities.name: Neural Theft
abilities.bottomDescription: Instantly use on a dead enemy player in your crosshairs to reveal the location of all living enemy players.

abilities.name: Cloudburst
abilities.bottomDescription:
Instantly throw your projectile that expands into a brief vision-blocking cloud on impact with a surface.
Hold the ability key to curve the smoke in the direction of your crosshair.

abilities.name: Updraft
abilities.bottomDescription: Instantly propel Jett high into the air.

abilities.name: Tailwind
abilities.bottomDescription: Instantly propel Jett in the direction she is moving. If Jett is standing still, she will propel forward.

abilities.name: Blade Storm
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a set of highly accurate throwing knives that recharge on killing an opponent.
Fire to throw a single knife at your target.
Alternate fire to throw all remaining daggers at your target. Right-click/Alternate Fire kills no longer recharge Jett’s kunai

abilities.name: FRAG/ment
abilities.bottomDescription: EQUIP an explosive fragment. FIRE to throw. The fragment sticks to the floor and explodes multiple times, dealing near lethal damage at the center with each explosion.

abilities.name: FLASH/drive
abilities.bottomDescription:
EQUIP a flash grenade. FIRE to throw. The flash grenade explodes after a short fuse, blinding anyone in line of sight.
Right clicking the flashbang, throws a charged flash, causing it to only have to cook for 1 second, as opposed to left click throwing a flash that cooks in 1.6 seconds.

abilities.name: ZERO/point
abilities.bottomDescription: EQUIP a suppression blade. FIRE to throw. The blade sticks to the first surface it hits, winds up, and suppresses anyone in the radius of the explosion.

abilities.name: NULL/cmd
abilities.bottomDescription:
INSTANTLY overload with polarized radianite energy that empowers KAY/O and causes large energy pulses to emit from his location. Enemies hit with these pulses are suppressed for a short duration.
While overloaded, KAY/O gains combat stim.
If KAY/O is killed while overloaded, he is downed and enters a destabilized state, allowing allies to stabilize his core and revive him.

abilities.name: Alarmbot
abilities.bottomDescription: Equip a covert Alarmbot. Fire to deploy a bot that hunts down enemies that get in range. After reaching its target, the bot explodes applying the Vulnerable effect. Hold equip to recall a deployed bot.

abilities.name: Nanoswarm
abilities.bottomDescription: Equip a Nanoswarm grenade. Fire to throw the grenade. Upon landing, the Nanoswarm goes covert. Activate the Nanoswarm to deploy a damaging swarm of nanobots.

abilities.name: Turret
abilities.bottomDescription: Equip a Turret. Fire to deploy a turret that fires at enemies in a 180 degree cone. Hold equip to recall the deployed turret.

abilities.name: Lockdown
abilities.bottomDescription: Equip the Lockdown device. Fire to deploy the device. After a long windup, the device Detains all enemies caught in the radius. The device can be destroyed by enemies.

abilities.name: Fast Lane
abilities.bottomDescription: FIRE two energy lines forward on the ground that extend a short distance or until they hit a surface. The lines rise into two walls of static electricity that block vision and damage enemies passing through them.

abilities.name: Relay Bolt
abilities.bottomDescription: INSTANTLY throw an energy bolt that bounces once. Upon hitting each surface, the bolt electrifies the ground below with a concussive blast.

abilities.name: High Gear
abilities.bottomDescription: INSTANTLY channel Neon's high power for increased speed. When charged, ALT FIRE to trigger an electric slide. Slide charge resets every two kills.

abilities.name: Overdrive
abilities.bottomDescription: Unleash Neon's full power and speed for a short duration. FIRE to channel the power into a deadly lightning beam with high movement accuracy. The duration resets on each kill.

abilities.name: Shrouded Step
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a shadow walk ability and see its range indicator.
Fire to begin a brief channel, then teleport the market location.

abilities.name: Paranoia
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a blinding orb.
Fire to throw it forward, briefly reducing the vision range and deafening all players it touches. This projectile can pass straight through walls.

abilities.name: Dark Cover
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a shadow orb and see its range indicator.
Press the ability key to throw the shadow orb to the marked location, creaint a long-lasting shadow sphere that blocks vision.
Press R to switch the view between the two view types
Hold primary fire while targeting to move the marker further away.
Hold secondary fire while targeting to move the marker closer.

abilities.name: From the Shadows
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a tactical map.
Fire to begin teleporting to the selected location. While teleporting Omen will appear as a Shade that can be destroyed by an enemy to cancel his teleport.
Press the ability key again to cancel the teleport.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a flame wall.
Fire to create a line of flames that moves forward. Creating a wall of fire that blocks vision and damages players passing through it.
Hold fire to bend the wall in the direction of your crosshair.

abilities.name: Curveball
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a fire orb that takes a curving path and detonates shortly after throwing.
Fire to curve the flare orb to the left, detonating and blinding any player who sees the orb.
Alternate fire to curve the flare orb to the right.

abilities.name: Hot Hands
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a fireball.
Fire to throw a fireball that explodes after a set amount of time or upon hitting the ground, creating a lingering fire zone that damages enemies.

abilities.name: Run it Back
abilities.bottomDescription: Instantly place a marker at Phoenix's location. While this ability is active, dying or allowing the timer to expire will end this ability and bring Phoenix back to his location with full health.

abilities.name: Blast Pack
abilities.bottomDescription:
Instantly throw a Blast Pack that will stick to surfaces.
Re-use the ability after deployment to detonate, damaging and moving anything hit.

abilities.name: Paint Shells
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a cluster grenade.
Fire to throw the grenade, which does damage and creates sub-munitions, each doing damage to anyone in their range.

abilities.name: Boom Bot
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip the Boom Bot.
Fire will deploy the bot, causing it to travel in a straight line on the ground, bouncing off walls. The Boom Bot will lock on to any enemies in its frontal cone and chase them, exploding for heavy damage if it reaches them.

abilities.name: Showstopper
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a rocket launcher.
Fire shoots a rocket that does massive area damage on contact with anything.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.bottomDescription: Enemies killed by Reyna leave behind Soul Orbs that last 3 seconds. Instantly consume a nearby soul orb, rapidly healing for a short duration. Health gained through this skill exceeding 100 will decay over time. If Empress is active, this skill will automatically cast and not consume the Soul Orb.

abilities.name: Dismiss
abilities.bottomDescription: Instantly consume a nearby Soul Orb, becoming instangible for a short duration. If Empress is active, also become invisible.

abilities.name: Leer
abilities.bottomDescription: Equip an ethereal, destructible eye. Activate to cast the eye a short distance forward. The eye will nearsight all enemies who look at it.

abilities.name: Empress
abilities.bottomDescription: Instantly enter a frenzy, increasing firing, equip and reload speed by 15%. Gain infinite charges of Soul Harvest abilities. When an enemy dies to Reyna, or dies within 3 seconds of taking damage from Reyna, the duration is renewed.

abilities.name: Barrier Orb
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a barrier orb.
Fire places a solid wall.
Alternate fire rotates the targeter.

abilities.name: Slow Orb
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a slow orb.
Fire to throw a slowing orb forward that detonates upon landing, creating a lingering field that slows players caught inside of it.

abilities.name: Healing Orb
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a healing orb.
Fire with your crosshairs over a damaged ally to active a heal-over-time on them.
Alternate fire while Sage is damaged to activate a self heal-over-time.

abilities.name: Resurrection
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a resurrection ability.
Fire with your crosshairs placed over a dead ally to begin resurrecting them. After a brief channel, the ally will be brought back to life with full health.

abilities.name: Regrowth
abilities.bottomDescription: Equip a healing trinket. Hold fire to channel, healing allies in range and line of sight. Can be used until her healing pool is depleted. Skye cannot heal herself.

abilities.name: Trailblazer
abilities.bottomDescription: Equip a Tasmanian tiger trinket. Fire to send out and take control of the predator. While in control, Fire to leap forward, exploding in a concussive blast and damaging directly hit enemies.

abilities.name: Guiding Light
abilities.bottomDescription: Equip a hawk trinket. Fire to send it forward. Hold fire to guide the hawk in the direction of your crosshair. Re-use while the hawk is in flight to transform it into a flash. If the Re-Use is not pressed the bird will disappear without a flash

abilities.name: Seekers
abilities.bottomDescription: Equip a Seekers trinket. Fire to send out three Seekers to track down the three closest enemies. if a Seeker reaches its target, it nearsights them.

abilities.name: Owl Drone
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip an owl drone.
Fire to deploy and take control of movement of the drone. While in control of the drone, Fire to shoot a marking dart. This dart will reveal the location of any player struck by the dart.

abilities.name: Shock Bolt
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a bow with a shock bolt. Fire to send the explosive bolt forward, detonating upon collision and damaging players nearby.
Hold fire to extend the range of the projectile.
Alternate fire to add up to two bounces to this arrow.

abilities.name: Recon Bolt
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a bow with recon bolt.
Fire to send the recon bolt forward, activating upon collision and revealing the location of nearby enemies caught in the line of sight of the bolt. Enemies can destroy this bolt. The bolt will scan 3 times before breaking with 1 second between each scan.
Hold fire to extend the range of the projectile.
Alternate fire to add up to two bounces to this arrow.

abilities.name: Hunter's Fury
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a bow with three long-range, wall-piercing energy blasts.
FIRE to release an energy blast in a line in front of Sova. Dealing damage and revealing the location of enemies caught in the line.
This ability can be Re-used up to two more times while the ability timer is active.

abilities.name: Snake Bite
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a chemical launcher.
Fire to launch a canister that shatters upon hitting the floor, creating a lingering chemical zone that damages agents and inflicts the Vulnerable debuff for 2s, making them receive 200% damage from other sources.

abilities.name: Poison Cloud
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a gas emitter.
Fire to throw the emitter that perpetually remains throughout the round.
Re-use the ability to create a toxic gas cloud at the cost of fuel. This ability can be re-used more than once and can be picked up to be redeployed. If picked up Poison Cloud can be taken into the next round.

abilities.name: Toxic Screen
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a gas emitter launcher.
Fire to deploy a long line of gas emitters.
Re-use the ability to create a tall wall of toxic gas at the cost of fuel. This ability can be re-used more than once.

abilities.name: Viper's Pit
abilities.bottomDescription:
Equip a chemical sprayer.
Fire to spray a chemical cloud in all directions arond Viper, creating a large cloud that reduces the vision range and maximum health of players inside of it.

abilities.name: Blindside
abilities.bottomDescription: EQUIP to rip an unstable dimensional fragment from reality. FIRE to throw the fragment, activating a flash that winds up once it collides with a hard surface in the world

abilities.name: Fakeout
abilities.bottomDescription: EQUIP an echo that transforms into a mirror image of Yoru when activated. FIRE to instantly activate the mirror image and send it forward. ALT FIRE to place an inactive echo. USE to transform an inactive echo into a mirror image and send it forward. Mirror images explode in a blinding flash when destroyed by enemies.

abilities.name: Gatecrash
abilities.bottomDescription: EQUIP to harness a rift tether. FIRE to send the tether out moving forward. ALT FIRE to place a tether in place. ACTIVATE to teleport to the tether's location. USE to trigger a fake teleport.

abilities.name: Dimensional Drift
abilities.bottomDescription: EQUIP a mask that can see between dimensions. FIRE to drift into Yoru's dimension, unable to be affected or seen by enemies from the outside.
